name: ConceptDraw
tag_list: project-management, mindmapping, productivity, collaboration, social-media, software-solutions, mindmap, mind-map, mind-mapping, mindmapping-software-mac, mindmapping-software-win, capture-idea, brainstorm, brainstorming, create-presentation, present-idea
overview:
CS Odessa is the developer of ConceptDraw products a world-class, visual productivity solutions that have transformed the way many companies approach their daily work. Since 1993, CS Odessa has been applying a passion for innovation to the world of business software and has become a Software 500 company in the process.

CS Odessa is the developer of ConceptDraw Office which is a comprehensive suite of fully featured business productivity tools, including ConceptDraw PRO for business diagramming, ConceptDraw MINDMAP for mind mapping, and ConceptDraw PROJECT for project management. These three tools utilize CS Odessa sophisticated INGYRE2 technology to deliver some incredibly powerful integration features that are unique to ConceptDraw.

video_embeds.description: With the Word Exchange solution you can create effective MS Word documents directly from ConceptDraw MINDMAP quickly and easily!

ConceptDraw PROJECT contains an extensive tool set to help project managers. The rich data visualization capability that is provided by ConceptDraw products helps you create project dashboards, one-click reports, multi-project views, Gantt charts, and res
A Visual Dashboard visualizes the actual data from an external data sources. It helps you to evaluate the information, allowing you to make the correct decisions and take any urgent action necessary.
